dmca.title: DUPLICATE www.youngdriversdurham.com infringement of YOUNG DRIVERS of Canada
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Adrian Borowsky [mailto:ABorowsky@YoungDrivers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 23, 2006 10:42 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DUPLICATE www.youngdriversdurham.com infringement of YOUNG
DRIVERS of Canada
Subject: DUPLICATE www.youngdriversdurham.com infringement of YOUNG
DRIVERS of Canada






ThePlanet.com Internet Services
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel                        BY FAX,
EMAIL and Courier
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
copyright@theplanet.com
Dallas, TX 75207                                                   (214)
782-7756
United States of America

Dear ThePlanet.com,

It has come to my attention that you are hosting
www.youngdriversdurham.com

This website has used YOUNG DRIVERS* of Canada trademarked logos, and
copyrighted material without authorization.

You neither asked for nor received permission to use our logos or
trademarks as the basis for www.youngdriversdurham.com
<http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/> .

I demand that you immediately cease the distribution of all our logos,
copyrighted verbiage, and that you desist from this or any other
infringement of YOUNG DRIVERS* of Canada rights in the future.

If I have not received an affirmative response from you by August 29,
2006 indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I
shall consider taking the full legal remedies available to rectify this
situation.

Sincerely,


Adrian Borowsky
Systems Support Manager
Young Drivers of Canada
One James Street South, Suite 300
Hamilton, Ontario, L8P 4R5

Email Aborowsky@youngdrivers.com
Phone 905 529-5501 x 233
Fax   905 529-5913
Infringement References:
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/images/layout_01.jpg
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/codriver.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/difference.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/carteach.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/classteach.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/instructors.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/qualitycontrol.php
http://www.youngdriversdurham.com/privacy.php
